channel.title: Rant
channel.description:
Im sick of all these gay ass mods who lock threads whenever they feel like it for no good reason, im sick of all these bastards that think they're cool and try to act tough, and people who are just damn retarded. Whenever I make a thread the first post is "amg dis thread s00x delete plz i report!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" they report it and it gets locked for no hell of a reason. What the fuck is wrong with these mods? Even googles mods are better than mopars. Actually, I might even go back to google because this is a shit community who doesn't care about each other whatsoever.
I bet the first post will be "reported" or "you're late" like every other post these assholes make.
EDIT: Even better, I will list the biggest assholes of the community. They think they're cool and report topics because they feel like it:
Davidi2 Clockwise27
Good bye faggots.

item.title: Rant
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Maybe if you read the rules and didn’t act like an idiot, your posts and topics wouldn’t get removed.

Read full topic
